blog.name: askironstrangefamily
blog.title: Ask The Ironstrange Family!
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to the blog of the Ironstrange Family!

summary: Peter, have you ever been embarrassed by your dads in school before?
question: Peter, have you ever been embarrassed by your dads in school before?
answer:
Tony likes to pop up at Peter’s school whenever the chance arrives. 

(I’m still without my tablet pen for another week so bear with me here- I have three different comic strips done for the mini-series I’ve been posting but I want them lined digitally before I post them. Sorry ;-;)

Note: I’ve just now realized that I forgot to sketch the sleeves of Tony’s shirt in on the fourth panel. I swear he isn’t shirtless. But I’m also tired of computer and phone problems I’m not going to fix it, sorry.

blog.name: sharon-stark
blog.title: A Stark Forever
blog.description:
WORK IN PROGRESS 
Hey there! Welcome to my tumblr! I have many loves and obsessions which you will most likely be seeing here! Including: A LOT of Robert Downey Jr related things, Tv shows, video games, movies, art, etc. I'm a huge lover of many things and I shall list some for you so you are aware of the content on his blog! 
TV SHOWS: Once Upon A Time (especially Rumbelle), Scandal (especially Olitz), Ally McBeal, This Is Us, The X-Files, The Walking Dead (a lot of violence and gore comes with the show, you have been warned), Castle, Grey's Anatomy, InuYasha, and many more!
 MOVIES: Disney movies, Iron Man and other marvel movies,  RDJ movies, Robert Carlyle movies, Tony Goldwyn movies, David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson content, and many more!
OTPS: Rumbelle (Rumple x Belle), Olitz (Olivia x Fitz), Pepperony (Pepper Potts x Tony Stark), Sculder (Scully x Mulder), Caskett (Castle x Beckett), Dizzie (Denny x Izzie) and many more! :D 
I LOVE to talk and scream about things, so feel free to jump into my asks and messages at anytime! Although I am a nervous and shy person, I'm very friendly! Come scream and flail with me about OTPs, TV Shows, movies, fics, etc. 
I also write and do some graphics (lame graphics) and will probably post them here!

summary: Okay, but, Tony and Pepper renewing their vows after the events of Endgame. They have another wedding where this time, EVERYONE...
body:
Okay, but, Tony and Pepper renewing their vows after the events of Endgame. They have another wedding where this time, EVERYONE can be there. This idea coming from Peter because of how disappointed he is that he couldn’t be there for the first one so he asks them to redo it and bam, another Pepperony wedding, but this time it’s not following a tragedy, there’s no loss of loved ones, no danger, none of that.

Instead it follows victory and the joy of everyone being back together. 

Plus, Morgan as flower girl? YES, PLEASE.

summary: Daily Dose of Chaos
title: Daily Dose of Chaos
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JW64bg

by twyly56

Loki likes to come down to Midgard sometimes to cause trouble, mostly because it irks Thor to no end when he disappears. He finds a nine year old boy whose uncle was just shot in front of him. And Norns be damned, he can’t stand crying children. So clearly he has to do something about this.

Words: 1023, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man), Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Thor (Marvel), Frigga | Freyja (Marvel), Odin (Marvel), Heimdall (Marvel), Loki’s Children (Marvel), Ned Leeds

summary: Superstar
title: Superstar
body:

by spiderks

“Who’s that?”

“Who, him? That’s Steve Rogers.”

Bucky’s spit take was a definite ten out of ten.

Words: 2818, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.description: My old account (team-downey1965 ) closed. This my new account.

summary:
Avengers: End Game ( 2019)
